messages.subject: Oprah (OT), was; moms doing what they want
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/30/03 4:11:12 PM, mummy124@bellsouth.net writes:  I m right now trying to get tix (actually, reservations)
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/30/03 4:11:12 PM, mummy124@... writes:

<< went to Chicago for Oprah >>

I'm right now trying to get tix (actually, reservations) to her show. The
current phone message says it's full for May, and the line will re-open up
when June shows are scheduled. I need to plan this trip waaaay in advance,
mostly because my girlfriend who will be going with me (hubby and kids
staying here), needs to tell her work in January her vacation days for the
whole year. Also advance planing because of airline tix (I live in
California) and hotel reservations. So my Q to you (or anyone else who knows)
is, once I finally get ahold of the show, do you happen to know if they make
any kind of reservations way in advance (as in mid-next year) now, or is it
each month for the following month? (It doesn't specify on the website or
phone recording.) It's my understanding that it's hard to get thru, and that
when you do, tix are mostly already gone. So, I don't know how I'm going to
plan a trip in advance if that's the case, and I can't get advance
reservations. TIA to any who has info!! Lara...........
